channel.title: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!
channel.description: I have a battlescape client and im trying to change the client background which is located in the images.dat file. the only issue is, is that im not sure what to open that image.dat with? the cache has nothing to do with this and i just needed guidance finding my way into that file, thanks to all. Donations awarded to people who help.

item.title: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!
item.dc:creator: @ladesman ladesman
item.description:
@ladesman wrote:

post a client link on here ill change it for u and ill put a tut in there so that you kno how to change it to what you want

Read full topic
item.source: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!

item.title: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

go to where the background image is, and delete it then get the pic of the background that you want save it as a .png image and name it as the other background title was in most clients the background is named “title”, then put it in the client files wherever it’s located?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!

item.title: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!
item.dc:creator: @Slayer6533 Slayer6533
item.description:
@Slayer6533 wrote:

A lot of people need help with this same problem, including myself. Please someone help solve this problem! The client is shit unless you can change the background…seriously…

It’s like giving someone your homework, and you tell them they HAVE to keep YOUR name on it…

It’s like giving someone a brand new car, but you tell them they HAVE to keep your name painted on the hood of the car…

It’s completely mental. Please tell us how to solve this problem!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help so bad "changing client background" please!
